Hello Thangadurai,

On 8/16/07, Thangadurai Alias Kumar <kaninkumar@...> wrote:
> Hi, i am new to JUnit. In my project i suppose to do JUnit. Can any
>  one help me out. I tried with some examples. But not satisfied till.
>  Can any  one of you give me junit code, which handles HttpRequest &
>  HttpResponse.

You'd probably benefit from getting your hands on one of the many
JUnit-related books available, such as "JUnit in Action" (by Ted
Husted and Vincent Massol) or "JUnit Recipes" (by J. B. Rainsberger).
My book covers testing Java web applications too, but the above two
titles are likely a better fit for you if you're just starting your
journey into the world of unit testing.

In the meanwhile, you can find a number of online articles and
tutorials that talk about testing Java Servlets.

Lasse


-- 
Lasse Koskela
* Author of "Test Driven" (Manning Publications, 2007) *
* Reaktor Innovations * http://www.ri.fi/en *
